By Carl Carlisle on Friday, November 24, 2000 - 07:41 pm:

I tried to look up hentai in the dictionary, but couldn't find it. What is it?
I don't like ALL perversions.

By Lisa Shock on Friday, November 24, 2000 - 08:54 pm:

It's unauthorized Japanese fan fiction/comics taking known media characters and putting them into x-rated stories. They are books pretty commonly available in Japan. I actually bought a MR/Pixie one on Ebay a few months ago, have NEVER seen another, though! (It is quite explicit.)

By Kurasu Soratobu on Friday, November 24, 2000 - 09:05 pm:

Actually, the term 'hentai' means 'pervert', in general. The unauthorized comics are known as 'doujinshi'. A lot of doujinshi is hentai, but not all hentai is doujinshi.

Ahem. Alright. I've had my burst of 'retentiveness' for the day. ^_-
